creator: super pop  saga games Ld
descriptionHtml:
The classic and most addictive Bubble Shooter game, now available to download on Google Play for free.
It's a ancient puzzle and Match-Three game.
As a classic game, Bubble Shooter is popular at all over the world.
No matter women, child, elderly, housewives, handsome man, pretty girls all love Bubble Shooter.
Bubble Shooter is a very funny and happy game.if you like bubble shooting game,
It is worth to try. Let's play it!
Follow our Roundy to have a Round-the-world Bubble Travel. it’s a great way to kill time!

The task of the game is to clear the playing field by forming groups of 3 or more like-colored bubbles, the goal of the game is to get the highest possible score, a player wins when there are no bubbles remaining on the playing field.

This is a all free game. You can play it without wifi. It's a real offline game.

This game is fun, easy to play, and extremely addicting! You begin by playing 1or 2 levels to pass the time and next thing you know, you glance at your clock and it's 5, 6, even 7hrs later! Don't believe me. Try it out and see for yourself where the hrs have gone. There are free helps but also plenty of "ammunition" to clear the level without the helps. And ads are not intrusive at all.


How to play this game?
1. Your finger move to the target, aim, and shoot!
2. Match 3 bubbles can clear them.
3. Clear all bubbles the game levels is complete.
4. Match more bubbles to make them burst can get points as bonus.
5. Every color you clear will not appear again.
6. At the end of game, All bubble will be pop out. Tap the bubble also can get points as bonus.


Features:
1. easy operation but lots of fun.
2. Gorgeous special effects and beautiful images.
3. Different roles dress
4. Many interesting props to help you pass game quickly
5. A combination of multiple bubbles
6. No wifi can also play



Any feedback please emails us, because we can’t reply on comments. Thanks very much for all your support in our games!

email :
mmjmobilecoder@gmail.com

#We are all free game, No in app purchase.
#Bubble shooter is offline game, you don't need internet. We are no wifi games.

The Most Important:
As a all free bubble shooter, We need ads to feed our team.
If ads make you feel bad, you can close your wifi.

The last entreat:
Please download it and rating it. Develop a free game is too hard, we need your support. If our game is not good enough, we can change and improve it.
descriptionShort: Classic Bubble Shooter is a free game.It's a puzzle and Match-Three game.
title: bubble shooter
